title: The ranked system is weird....
body: So I and my friend recently got promoted to Bronze 4 and for some reason, I only earn 12 LP per game I win. Also, I duo queued with my friend and we won the game and he earned 20 LP while I only earned 12 LP. Also one time I was at 24 LP and I lost a game and lost 21 LP, but instead of changing my LP back to 3, that match changed my LP to 0. Can someone explain what is happening?
